txt.en: You have lit the torches in the southern section of the Twenty-first Hall that were blown out by a chill draft.
The torches around the south arch have been blown out, and a chill draft near this hall has filled you with a bit of dread.

You have restored some light to the Twenty-first Hall, and the dread has lessened, yet you still feel a chill breeze. These torches will need to be re-lit often.\n\nYou feel no eagerness to explore south of the Twenty-first Hall....
The torches around the south arch have been blown out, and a chill draft near this hall has filled you with a bit of dread.
Blown-out torches can be found near the south arch of the Twenty-first Hall.\n\nYou should light the torches to stave off the chill draft.
Blown-out torches can be found near the south arch of the Twenty-first Hall.\n\nYou should light the torches to stave off the chill draft.
